general: Today, the Moon in harmony with Pluto invites you to explore your deepest emotions. You may discover hidden truths about yourself and your relationships. It is a favorable time to initiate meaningful conversations.
love: Express your feelings freely, it will strengthen your bond.
work: Focus on your personal projects, your creativity will be your greatest asset today.
health: Consider incorporating moments of relaxation into your day to avoid stress.
advice: Dare to dive into your emotions to emerge stronger.
